title: Episode 194: The Nain Rouge
description:
It takes boldness to build a city, but for Motown’s founder, being self-assured meant his downfall. The hubris of man is a dangerous thing, but not as dangerous as a demonic force that must be appeased to keep it from wreaking havoc on those it encounters. Detroiters know to beware of this devilish creature, if not, the consequences can be severe. 

Recorded live at the Majestic Theatre in Detroit, MI
